summary: Tested mobile UI fixes for Android device issues. Verified: 1) Bottom navigation visible and styled with proper padding, 2) Category subcategories appear at TOP of page with horizontal scroll, 3) Category page does NOT show 'No listings' flash (hasFetched guard working), 4) Listing detail shows structured placeholder during load (no white flash), 5) Search for 'car' returns 18 results correctly. All requested fixes appear to be implemented and functional on web mobile viewport.

minor.issue: Console shows 'Failed to load resource: 404' for some requests - may be image or asset related

issues: Currency shows â‚¬ (Euro) instead of TSh for some listings - may be inconsistent currency handling

critical_code_review_comments: localStorage QuotaExceededError appearing: '@cache_home_listings' storage quota exceeded - cache needs cleanup/management
Console warning: [Layout children]: No route named 'search' exists in nested children - search tab routing issue
Console warning: 'shadow*' style props deprecated, should use boxShadow
Duplicate key warnings in FlatList: 'Encountered two children with the same key' - may cause rendering issues
context_for_next_testing_agent: Mobile UI fixes verified working on web viewport. All 5 user-reported bugs addressed: 1) Tab bar has Math.max(insets.bottom, 16) padding for Android, 2) Subcategories at top of category page in horizontal ScrollView, 3) hasFetched flag prevents 'No listings' flash, 4) Listing detail shows placeholder UI instead of white screen, 5) Search works correctly returning results. Note: Testing was done on web with mobile viewport (375x812), not actual Android device. Physical device testing may reveal additional platform-specific behavior.

bottom_navigation_fix.implementation: Uses Math.max(insets.bottom, 16) for Android to ensure minimum padding even when system insets are 0
bottom_navigation_fix.status: VERIFIED - tab bar visible at bottom of mobile viewport

category_subcategories_position.status: VERIFIED - Subcategories (All, Laptops & Computers, TV & DVD...) appear in horizontal scroll at top of page, below search bar

category_no_listings_flash_fix.implementation: hasFetched state flag prevents showing 'No listings found' until initial fetch completes
category_no_listings_flash_fix.status: VERIFIED - No 'No listings' flash observed during page load

listing_detail_placeholder_fix.implementation: Structured placeholder UI with header, image area skeleton, and content placeholders
listing_detail_placeholder_fix.status: VERIFIED - Listing detail shows gray placeholder structure during load, not white blank screen

search_functionality.status: VERIFIED - Search for 'car' returns 18 results correctly, no false 'no results' message

test_evidence.homepage: Shows listings, bottom nav visible with Home/Saved/Messages/Profile tabs
test_evidence.category_page: 82 listings found, subcategory pills (All, Laptops & Computers, TV & DVD...) at top
test_evidence.listing_detail: Shows placeholder then loads content (price, title, location, details sections)
